name: StinkyCave
description:
You've found yourself in a cave. You know moving towards the flag gets you to the exit, but every time you touch the flag you find yourself in the same cave--again and again! You have only one defense mechanism from the rock-like cave dwellers, but be careful not to damage yourself, lest the cave gets too stinky. 

Arrow keys, WASD - move around

Space - defense mechanism
